org.fcrepo.http.commons.session

Class SessionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.http.commons.session.SessionFactory

  • public class SessionFactory
extends Object
    Factory for generating sessions for HTTP requests, taking into account transactions and authentication.
    Author:
    awoods, gregjan, kaisternad
